overview: Three women and two men appear one after the other without any context and continue to act in a disorderly manner through cutbacks. However, as the scene progresses, the relationship between each of them begins to emerge, and eventually, the five are connected by a single thread. This is a typical relationship between a man and a woman, or a woman and a woman, but the sharp images accurately capture the emptiness of the relationship. The line in the film, "I'm all alone", is unforgettable.
title: The Cold Sunday
